idea:
At PHAVN Pharmaceuticals we believe that health is a primary need to feel and wander the world. Keeping the main theme of health and longevity, we are dealing in neutraceuticals, herbal, ayurvedic and alopathic products which help our consumer to achieve their highest potential of life either it may be physical or meta physical. To drastically achieve our Goal of healthy body, mind and spirit, we take due care for quality and quantity assurances.

We would love to hear from you and to help you in your endeavour of life. Let's create a sustainable life with hand in hands. Happy to serve your needs..
name: PHAVN PHARMACEUTICALS

idea: Veggify Farms is focused on promoting organic inputs for agricultural activities. We believe that the impact of organic agriculture on natural resources favors interactions within the ecosystem that are vital for both agriculture production & nature conservation. We aim to produce energy efficient and environment friendly fertilizers that ensures sustainable crop yield .A wide range of Bio-pesticides, bio-fertilizers, bio-fungi is manufactured by Veggify Farms.
name: Veggify Farms

idea:
Anthony Engineering LLP was registered and incorporated on Dec 28, 2021, as a Limited Liability Partnership.


Anthony Engineering LLP is a diverse group of inventors who build and launch technologies that aim to improve the lives of billions of people.


Our goal: 10x impact on India’s most intractable problems in automotive tech, not just 10% improvement. We approach projects that have the aspiration and riskiness of research with the speed and ambition of a startup.
name: ANTHONY ENGINEERING LLP

idea: Yende Legal Associates (YLA) is registered as LL.P. with Registrar, Ministry of Corporate Affairs, Govt. of India, the Bar Council of Maharashtra & Goa, and Bombay High Court(original side). It provides services of legal consultancy, litigation, arbitration, mediation, and other related services. It provides high-quality, timely legal service: affordable legal solutions, to the client's satisfaction. We also create awareness amongst common people about the legal system and government policies.  Moreover, we provide legal aid to poor people.  Established in the year 2018, Yende Legal Associates is located in the prime locality of Mumbai, having branches in Nagpur, Delhi, and Hyderabad.  Adv. (Dr.) Ashok Yende Founder is a doctorate in law, former Professor & Head, Department of Law, the University of Mumbai whereas co-founder Adv. Abhishek Yende is a double post-graduate, LL. M. from the U.K., and Mumbai University. . Recently, the firm has established, the " Arbitration & Mediation Cell" to settle disputes amicably and peaceful manner, with the support of judges, eminent lawyers, and expert mediators. We provide internships to young law graduates and planning to expand activities to remote places.
name: YENDE LEGAL ASSOCIATES LLP

idea: Printent is an online aggregator that helps individuals and students to access affordable printing solutions for their daily needs
name: Printent

idea:
“Ezeefoods Enterprises LLP” is established to carry on the business of food supply to schools and other educational institutions under various government schemes.

The company aims to provide the food and dietary services in various govt. sectors such as Schools, Hospitals, and Railways etc.

We aim to make the nation healthy. To sustain it we provide the healthy food and dietary services to the students, patients and travellers.

Research shows that students who participate in the school meal programs consume more whole grains, milk, fruits, and vegetables during meal times and have better overall diet quality, than nonparticipants. And, eating breakfast at school is associated with better attendance rates, fewer missed school days, and better test scores. Meals served through these programs must meet specific nutrition requirements.

Schools can encourage students to participate in the school meal programs by:

• Providing meals that are nutritious and appealing.

• Obtaining input from students and parents about items they would like to see served in the meals.

• Ensuring that students have adequate time to eat their meal (at least 10 minutes for breakfast and 20 minutes for lunch).

• Preventing the overt identification of students who are eligible to receive free or reduced-price meals.
name: EZEEFOODS ENTERPRISES LLP
